name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MailGPT - ChatGPT and Claude for Gmail

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the power of both ChatGPT and Claude AI models in your Email inbox

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use both ChatGPT and Claude AI in your Gmail inbox, brought to you by Pier20.ai (https://pier20.ai/).

MailGPT brings professional-grade AI writing assistance directly to your inbox, helping you craft perfect emails in seconds.

**Features**
1. Transform rough outlines into polished, professional emails instantly 
2. Convert meeting notes into clear, actionable emails with one click
3. Add wit and personality to your messages effortlessly
4. Simplify complex emails to improve readability and response rates
5. Create custom writing styles with personalized AI instructions

Stop spending hours crafting emails - let MailGPT help you communicate more effectively and get faster responses.

Getting started is simple: Just install the extension, create a free Pier20 account, and start writing better emails immediately. No separate ChatGPT, OpenAI, Claude, or Anthropic accounts needed!

** FAQs**
Q: What are ChatGPT and Claude?
A: ChatGPT (by OpenAI) and Claude (by Anthropic) are advanced AI language models trained on vast amounts of human knowledge. They excel at understanding context, processing information, and generating human-like text for various purposes, including email writing.

Q: What is MailGPT?
A: MailGPT is a free Chrome extension by Pier20.ai that brings powerful AI writing assistance directly to your Gmail inbox. It helps you write more effective emails faster, leading to better response rates.

Q: Is MailGPT free?
A: Yes, the extension is completely free to use.

Q: Do I need an account?
A: You'll need a free Pier20.ai account to use the extension. Simply visit https://app.pier20.ai/ to get started.

Q: Is this an official OpenAI or Anthropic product?
A: No, MailGPT was developed by the Pier20.ai team. Originally built for internal use, we've made it publicly available to help everyone write better emails.
